title: Crowley and Aziraphale's First Scene | Good Omens | Prime Video
author: Amazon Prime Video UK
comment: Which era suited Crowley and Aziraphale the best?
This, kids, is what we call the start of a 6000 year slowburn.
Ah yes, my two brain cells' first interaction.

I only JUST realised that Aziraphale wasn’t just being kind by shielding Crowley from the rain. Given how demons are hurt by holy water there’s every chance he may have been protecting him from it just in case
crowley moving under aziraphale's wing just as eve takes adam's hand... parallels <3
description:
In the opening scene of Good Omens, Crowley encourages Adam and Eve to eat from the forbidden fruit tree and Aziraphale gives them a weapon. It's quite the introduction to our favourite Angel and Demon duo. 
» SUBSCRIBE:
